text: Rupert is an elevated station on the Millennium Line of Metro Vancouver's SkyTrain rapid transit system. The station is located on Rupert Street in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada. Nearby businesses include the BC Liquor Distribution Branch and the Vancouver Film Studios. Falaise Park is also located just south of Rupert station. ==Station information== ===Transit connections=== Rupert station provides connections within Vancouver and is also serviced by HandyDART. Routes are as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Stop Number !
